features: 【CLEAN UP SMALL MESSES】- Adorable little whisk broom and dustpan for sweeping crumbs, little spills, coffee grounds, leftovers and small messes off counters and tables. From under-the-highchair cleanups to litter box overflow, no job is too small for this adorable pair. Everything gets picked up with ease rather than dragging out a giant dustpan and broom.

【JAPANESE MINIMALIST】- Little gadget that is aesthetically pleasing to have around. We hold the belief that less is more and strive to strip anything to its essentials. Creative ergonomic design for grip, brush snaps into dust pan and stores with the bristles covered. Using it you can feel the people who designed it were thoughtful about convenience and comfort.

【HUGS THE FLOOR】- The right tool for the job. Fine, dense, flexible bristles, sweep up the debris nice and easy. Whisk broom brush shape makes it easy to sweep from above and reach in corners. Non-slip dustpan lip conforms to surface seamlessly so dust is not swept under the dustpan. Brush snaps directly into dustpan, hangs or stands for easy storage.

【ALL PURPOSE】- Goes from dining to bedroom and beyond. Perfect little brush set for cat, dog, bunny and other small pets area, fantastic for pet hair. Lightweight hander sweeper ideal for cleaning the keyboard, cars, table, countertop, kitchens craft rooms even kids mealtime messes etc. Plus, it's perfect for kids to help out. Yes, kids love using it!

【PACKAGE INCLUDES】- 1 × broom, 1 × dustpan; Material: PP; Dimensions: 4.3" x 3.5"; Weight: 1.1oz. Buy with confidence, we are committed to providing quality products and 3-month worry-free guarantee. Please feel free to contact us if you have any concern.
body.description: THE RIGHT TOOL FOR THE JOB Little gadget that is aesthetically pleasing to have around. It does the trick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice little product. Perfect for keyboards and small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: It’s so tiny and cute! I hang it on my refrigerator and am constantly using it to sweep out crumbs from my toaster oven, microwave and counter top. It doesn’t clutter. Yea!🤗 My only complaint is the magnet could be a little stronger or not recessed so deeply into the little dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for spot cleaning small rodent's cage shelves in between deep cleaning
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mini broom and dust pan to clean after my pet mouse mess on the cage shelves in between deep cleaning. Small enough to fit through the doors and to move around the cage. Only issue is seller send me a pink color instead of the blue advertised color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great little tool to tidy up!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this tiny dustpan and brush for my desk at work as I often eat lunch at my desk and it gets a bit messy sometimes. When it arrived I loved how sturdy and handy it was ...so I took it to work but immediately went in and ordered a second one to keep at my desk at home. I've since found uses all over the house for tiny little messes or messes that are in tight spaces where a regular broom and dustpan won't work. I'm constantly reaching for it for something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cleaning out the hamster cage
reviews.reviewText: My daughter uses this to spot clean her dwarf hamster's cage. She can easily scoop out any hamster droppings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for mosiac dust!
reviews.reviewText: I do mosiac art and always have bits and pieces of tiles, dust, etc., and I hate having to get the dust vac out to sweep it up.This little guy gets it all, right into the little baby dustpan. Too darned cute as well as functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pricey for what you get.
reviews.reviewText: Overpriced. I would expect to pay less than a dollar for this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for accessing tiny places
reviews.reviewText: I use this tiny broom & dustpan to clean out my pellet stove. Much cheaper than a new vacuum every year! The fine ash just kills vacuums.
